scripts.sync-static: cp -r ../100x ../alpha-scout ../tools ../ib ../posts ../admin ../data public/ 2>/dev/null || true; cp -r ../100x/data/* public/data/ 2>/dev/null || true; cp -rn ../alpha-scout/data/* public/data/ 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build:runtime: npm run sync-static && NEXT_BUILD_TARGET=runtime next build
scripts.build:static: npm run sync-static && NEXT_BUILD_TARGET=static next build
